meanings.definition: The quality of happening by chance or accident.
meanings.sent1: The fortuitousnesses of finding a four-leaf clover made her day.
meanings.sent2: His success was due to the fortuitousnesses of being in the right place at the right time.
meanings.sent3: The fortuitousnesses of winning the lottery left him speechless.
meanings.sent4: The fortuitousnesses of stumbling upon a hidden treasure was like a dream come true.
meanings.sent5: The fortuitousnesses of meeting her long-lost friend after years made her heart swell with joy.

meanings.definition: The state of being fortunate or lucky.
meanings.sent1: She believed in the fortuitousnesses of fate guiding her towards happiness.
meanings.sent2: His fortuitousnesses in life always seemed to surprise those around him.
meanings.sent3: The fortuitousnesses of finding a dollar on the street made her smile.
meanings.sent4: The fortuitousnesses of having a loving family was a blessing beyond measure.
meanings.sent5: The fortuitousnesses of being born in a peaceful country was something she never took for granted.
